revisionDesc.change: checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have received from the District Attorney at Detroit, Michigan, through you, under your date of the 16th instant, the record of division of opinion in the case of the United States, vs. Henry C. Dewitt, which has been duly filed with the clerk of the Supreme Court, and the District Attorney so advised.
